description.value:
Using magic to pull back the veil on one object or creature, you learn the magical secrets that it holds.

  • Objects: Learn all of the following:
    • Identify Magic Item: If the object is a magic item, and if so, all of its magical properties, rules, and elements, how many charges it uses, if it requires attunement, and so on.
    • Identify Spell Effects: Whether any spells or magical effects are affecting the object and what they are.
    • Identify Magic Origin: If the object was created by a spell and which spell was used to create it.
  • Creatures: Learn all of the following:
    • Identify Conditions: Whether any spells or magical effects are affecting the creature and what they are.
    • Identify Creature: The creature’s type and core attributes.
    • Identify Durability: The creature’s weaknesses, resistances, and immunities.
    • Identify Attunement: Which items on their person they are attuned to, but not what they are capable of.

materials.value: A crystalline disc worth at least 100 gold
